description: Amendments to planning permission dated 18 August 2017 (RN: 17/03181) for Demolition of existing and erection of replacement single storey rear ground floor extension, installation of replacement shopfront, installation of metal railings to front forecourt, installation of four air conditioning units and enclosure on flat roof of rear extension, all in conjunction with the use of the first to fourth floors as three residential units (2 x 1-bedroom studios and 1 x 2-bedroom) (Class 3) and the continued use of the basement and ground floor levels as restaurant (Class A3); Namely, to change description of development to read as follows:Demolition of existing and erection of replacement single storey rear ground floor extension, installation of replacement shopfront, installation of metal railings to front forecourt, installation of four air conditioning units and enclosure on flat roof of rear extension, all in conjunction with the use of the first to fourth floors as residential accommodation (Class C3) and the continued use of the basement and ground floor levels as restaurant (Class A3).
